title: Luke Lamperti and his Second-Year Challenge: Sprinter, Classics Star, or Something Else?
content:
After an impressive rookie campaign, Lamperti faces a career-defining year: 'This season will show us exactly where he stands as a rider.'

Read the full article at Luke Lamperti and his Second-Year Challenge: Sprinter, Classics Star, or Something Else? on Velo.
author: ahood
